arguments.name: nameRequested
arguments.description: Set this flag if you require the user's full name to complete the order

arguments.name: phoneRequested
arguments.description: Set this flag if you require the user's phone number to complete the order

arguments.name: emailRequested
arguments.description: Set this flag if you require the user's email address to complete the order

arguments.name: shippingAddressRequested
arguments.description: Set this flag if you require the user's shipping address to complete the order

arguments.name: flexible
arguments.description: Set this flag if the final price depends on the shipping method

arguments.name: phoneToProvider
arguments.description: Set this flag if user's phone number should be sent to provider

arguments.name: emailToProvider
arguments.description: Set this flag if user's email address should be sent to provider

arguments.name: prices
arguments.description: Price breakdown, a list of components (e.g. product price, tax, discount, delivery cost, delivery tax, bonus, etc.)
